---
title: "01 | Fresh Anointing & Blocking Out Fear"
author: "C.O."
date: "January 2021"
---

January marks a new year on the calendar. Most people think you have to have a “resolution” for the New Year. Some resolutions are hopeful, some are made out of fear. In Christ, anytime can be a new year! Ask Him for a fresh anointing for wisdom and courage to face any New Year in your life.

Meditate on these verses to gain wisdom:

- Week 1  
  - Isaiah 41:10
- Week 2  
  - Deuteronomy 1:21
- Week 3  
  - 2 Timothy 1:7
- Week 4 
  - Isaiah 35:4
